content: When I first took a C course, I couldn't understand a single thing explained in class. Thank God I got a friend of mine who's a programmer to explain to me how the whole caboodle works.
translations: ita:Quando ho fatto per la prima volta un corso di C, non riuscivo a capire una sola cosa spiegata in classe. Grazie a Dio a
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by saeb (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
